Title: Shadowboxing
Plot: Claire is determined to get to the bottom of the Sorority Rush attacks on her own, until H.R.G. intervenes only to realize he may be the source of her troubles. Meanwhile, Peter's new ability is a perfect fit for his job and gives him the opportunity to help Emma accept her new life. Elsewhere, Sylar's battle at gaining full control over Matt's body escalates with potentially dangerous implications at stake.
GuestStars: Madeline Zima, Tessa Thompson, Dawn Olivieri, Carlease Burke, Assaf Cohen, Deanne Bray, Sally Champlin, Omar Leyva, Marie Wong, Anna Clark, Danica Stewart, Candice Patton, Kat Purgall, Cindy Chiu, Zoe Bolden, Evere
